title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: When modifying the default value set in a list box of a report parameter, the changes are not saved. This means that the initially set default value is lost and the modified default value is not retained. Steps to reproduce: 1. [Provide specific steps here]
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: After modifying the default value, the changes should be saved. The modified default value should be retained.
SR: 1. Open the report parameter settings. 2. Set a default value in the list box. 3. Modify the default value. 4. Save the changes. 5. Close and reopen the report parameter settings. 6. Verify that the modified default value is retained.
